title: Requinta de Braga
body: A small instrument with four strings, similar to the braguinha, and said to have been created by the late Madeiran musician Agostinho Martins. Its tuning is lá, ré, fá, lá, as informed by Dr. Manuel dos Passos Freitas.

Dr. Manuel dos Passos Freitas: Informed about the tuning of the requinta de Braga
